data.comment: Pedro Pelagio (Maritimo) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Estadio do Dragao have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Porto.
Free kick Maritimo.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Porto to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Estadio do Dragao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alex Telles, who is down injured.
In the minute 8, Alex Telles is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto push forward at Estadio do Dragao and Luis Diaz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
In the minute 11, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 13, Jorge Correa for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
Porto attack but Pepe's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 15, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a Maritimo throw-in in Porto's half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Porto.
Maritimo's Jean Irmer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Maritimo's Nanu breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Rui Costa awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Dragao.
Porto's Jesus Corona has run offside.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Porto.
Rodrigo Pinho scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio do Dragao.
Claudio Winck instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 26, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
In the minute 28, Maritimo's Zainadine Junior looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Zainadine Junior is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 31, Porto have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Sergio Oliveira (Porto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 35, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Porto.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Porto pushes forward through Jesus Corona, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Luis Diaz of Porto is pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Rui Costa signals a Porto throw-in in Maritimo's half.
In the minute 41, Porto's Wilson Manafa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Dragao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Pepe (Porto) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 42, Alex Telles with an assist there.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Maritimo to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Free kick Porto.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
In Porto Maritimo attack through Marcelo Hermes. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 45, Rui Costa awards Maritimo a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio do Dragao.
Rodrigo Pinho for Maritimo has been booked by Rui Costa and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 47, Luis Diaz for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
Rui Costa signals a Maritimo throw-in in Porto's half.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 50, In Porto Porto's Alex Telles is caught offside.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Chancel Mbemba (Porto) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 52, Jorge Correa (Maritimo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! Maritimo take a 1-2 lead through a well-placed header from Rodrigo Pinho.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Free kick Maritimo.
In the minute 54, Mehdi Taremi is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
In the minute 55, Jean Irmer's header is off-target for Maritimo.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Porto to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In the minute 57, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Nanu of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rui Costa awards Porto a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Porto's Danilo Pereira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Amir Abedzadeh.
Edgar Costa is on a sub for Jorge Correa for Maritimo.
In the minute 63, Amir Abedzadeh returns to the field for Maritimo after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in Porto.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 66, Porto are coming forward and Wilson Manafa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Maritimo’s Rodrigo Pinho and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 69, Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a second change, with Kibe replacing the possibly injured Rodrigo Pinho.
Jesus Corona (Porto) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
At Estadio do Dragao, Kibe has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Porto's Sergio Oliveira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Dragao.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto to check on Rene, who is grimacing with pain.
Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) has taken off Rene who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Milson is the replacement.
In the minute 77, Rui Costa signals a Porto throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In Porto Porto attack through Mehdi Taremi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 78, Rui Costa awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Porto's Alex Telles breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 81, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Porto make their second substitution with Ze Luis replacing Chancel Mbemba.
The home team replace Sergio Oliveira with Fabio Vieira.
In the minute 82, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pepe is booked for the home team.
Throw-in Porto.
In the minute 83, Porto's Otavio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
Moussa Marega for Porto drives towards goal at Estadio do Dragao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Porto's Otavio is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Sergio Conceicao is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Joao Mario replacing Wilson Manafa.
In the minute 88, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Porto.
Porto are awarded a penalty ... Alex Telles botches the spot kick!
In the minute 88, Alex Telles of Porto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Edgar Costa (Maritimo) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Rui Costa awards Porto a goal kick.
10 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Maritimo.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Porto to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Porto drive upfield and Fabio Vieira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Important block from the Maritimo defence as Alex Telles fires in a strike for Porto.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In Porto, Joao Mario of Porto is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mehdi Taremi (Porto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto's Mehdi Taremi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
Ze Luis for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Ze Luis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Porto.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
It's now 1-3 in Porto as Nanu scores for Maritimo.
Great play from Milson to set up the goal.
Otavio strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-3 at Estadio do Dragao.
That's a fine assist from Mehdi Taremi.
